summary: This is an email from a victim to Linda, likely attorney Linda Fairstein or another legal figure, discussing the victim's desire to testify in litigation against JP Morgan, referencing Adam (likely Epstein associate Adam Perry Lang or another 'Adam'), and seeking clarification about a class action objection filing. The email expresses gratitude for renewed hope and a push for accountability.

persons.name: Linda
persons.role: Attorney or legal advocate leading litigation
persons.context: Addressed as the recipient of the email; the writer thanks her for litigation against JP Morgan, seeks to testify, and requests help understanding legal documents.

persons.name: Adam
persons.role: Subject of allegations, associated with JP Morgan
persons.context: Referenced in relation to what the writer 'always knew' about him, linked to JP Morgan, and mentioned as needing to be held accountable.

persons.name: Jennifer
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who may join a scheduled conversation depending on information received.

connections.description: Linda is conducting litigation that involves allegations against Adam, as indicated by the writer's reference to closure about Adam from Linda's case.
The writer expresses trust in Linda, offers to testify in her case, and seeks legal guidance from her.
The writer implies personal knowledge of Adam's misconduct, suggesting a victim-perpetrator dynamic, and seeks accountability.

events.title: Class Action Objection Filed
events.description: Another victim filed an Objection on behalf of the class in the JP Morgan litigation, referenced by the email writer.

events.title: Email Sent Regarding Testimony and Press Release
events.description: The writer emails Linda to offer testimony in the JP Morgan case, discuss a press release, and seek clarification on a legal objection.

keyFacts: A victim offers to testify and provide materials in Linda's litigation against JP Morgan, seeking accountability for Adam and others.
The writer references a class action objection filed on September 15, 2023, and seeks to identify if they are part of a specific subset mentioned in it.
The email indicates the writer feels silenced in the past but now finds hope and a path to healing through the legal action.
The writer is seeking to identify the attorney and firm that filed the recent objection to contact them about filing their own objection.
